question: In context of administration of Firoj Shah Tughlaq, Diwan-i-Bundagan represent which department?
option2: department for poor and needy people
explanation: In context of administration of Sultan Firoj Shah Tughlaq, he established Diwan-i-Khairat (the department for poor and needyÂ people) and Diwan-i-Bundagan (department of slaves).
